mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_article_comment (article_id, user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.article_id AS articleId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.created_at AS createdAt, u.nickname, u.avatar_url AS avatarUrl FROM community_article_comment c LEFT JOIN user_info u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
